name: PaybandCoin
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Lux Stellar Payband is one of the world’s first wristbands wallets for making contactless cryptocurrency payments with Stellar Lumens and all Stellar tokens including our custom Payband Coin (PYBC) fueling our events ecosystem.  Our technology initially designed as a cashless wristband crypto payment system for fairs, festivals, concerts and events has expanded to include uses for merchant exchange of goods and services, customer loyalty programs, logistics management and the tourism & hospitality industries.
